item.title: Whisker Squadron: Survivor launches February 21 for PS5, PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/whisker-squadron-survivor-launches-february-21-for-ps5-pc

  • PC
  • PS5

Currently in Early Access for PC.

Roguelite shoot ’em up game Whisker Squadron: Survivor will leave Early Access and launch for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam on February 21, developer Flippfly announced.

Whisker Squadron: Survivor first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on August 21, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via Flippfly:

About

An intense roguelike shooter from the creators of Race the Sun, featuring a voiced cast of feline characters known as Whisker Squadron.

Choose your ship and outfit it with your weapons of choice, then take the fight to The Swarm, a robotic army of robotic bugs controlled by a shadowy corporation.

Chart a course through a dynamic galaxy map across three acts, making tactical choices along the way to turn your ship into a finely tuned bot-killing machine.

Each randomized run is an opportunity to fight through wave upon wave of Swarm bots while honing your skills, getting to know your crewmates, and learning more about the mysterious origins of Whisker Squadron’s leader, Gigi. After each run, spend your earnings on permanent ship upgrades and unlockable weapons.

Key Features

  • Three distinct acts, each featuring unique enemies and boss fights.
  • Voiced cast of characters.
  • Three ships, seven weapons, and dozens of upgrades to choose from.
  • Unlock and complete more than two dozen Challenges to prove your skills.
  • Too easy for you? Choose from several unlockable mods to crank up the difficulty.
  • Several accessibility options to tune your experience.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer

item.title: Low-poly 3D Metroidvania action platformer AEROMACHINA announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/low-poly-3d-metroidvania-action-platformer-aeromachina-announced-for-pc

Meteor Magic Games has announced AEROMACHINA, a low-poly Metroidvania action platformer inspired by the original PlayStation era. It will be available for PC via Steam. A release date was not announced. A demo is coming soon.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

In 2X2X, Earth is ravaged, humanity is absent, and new life is born of old machines. You are Bogey, an amnesic android that awakens to nothing but danger and a dream: to fly away. With the help of new allies, fly and fight through the ruins of human civilization, searching for the answers to their disappearance… and your very existence.

AEROMACHINA is a high-altitude, low-poly 3D platformer Metroidvania lovingly inspired by the PSX era! Soar through the labyrinthine world that holds you, cutting through foes with your trusty propeller blade. Open new paths through the world, and your enemies, by discovering new abilities and weapons. With jet wings, roaring engines, and all flavors of firepower, nothing can keep you away from the blue skies above.

Key Features

  • Snappy platformer gameplay that transforms in new environments and with new abilities.
  • Stylish beat ’em up combat with a plethora of upgradable weapons to exploit any weakness.
  • A diverse, non-linear world to explore. New abilities offer new paths to explore, but ace players will find their own way without them.
  • Rose-tinted low-poly graphics that modernize and expand upon an iconic art style.
  • A colorful cast of friends, rivals, and enemies. In 2X2X, everything and everyone is a little weird.
  • Additional replay value, such as new game plus, speedrun mode, and a built-in randomizer mode.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Teaser Trailer
